content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/Textualize/rich.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image as a base
FROM python:3.11

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install Poetry
RUN pip install poetry

# Create an isolated virtual environment and install dependencies
RUN poetry config virtualenvs.create false \
    && poetry install

# Run the tests to ensure everything works
RUN make test
